sections.heading: of law repealing former law; effect
sections.text: Whenever a law shall be repealed, which repealed a former law, the former law shall not thereby be revived unless specially provided for.SourceG.S.1873, c. 79, § 3, p. 1056;R.S.1913, § 3710;C.S.1922, § 3098;C.S.1929, § 49-302;R.S.1943, § 49-302.AnnotationsHistory
